alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 9:44PM EST until March 06 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Wind gusts along peaks and ridges may gust in excess of 60 mph. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Open fields or lakes may experience brief periods of poor visibility in blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recreation areas including ski areas across the mountains should be prepared for strong to potentially damaging wind gusts late tonight through much of Monday.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
